name: VPCPeeringConnection
shortDesc: A VPC peering connection enables a network connection between two virtual private clouds (VPCs) so that you can route traffic between them by means of a private IP addresses. For more information about VPC peering and its limitation, see VPC Peering Overview in the Amazon VPC Peering Guide.

properties.name: PeerVpcId
properties.desc: The ID of the VPC with which you are creating the peering connection.

properties.name: Tags
properties.desc: An arbitrary set of tags (keyâ€“value pairs) for this resource.

properties.name: VpcId
properties.desc: The ID of the VPC that is requesting a peering connection.
